laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Merle d’Aubigné and Postel score evaluation (hip function)
laboratory_examinations.date: Initially assessed in 1976; last follow-up in 2005
laboratory_examinations.findings: Left side improved from 7 points preoperatively to 14 points at ten years, then decreased to 8 points. Right side improved from 6 points preoperatively to 13 points at ten years, then decreased to 9 points.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Left side score improved over ten years and then declined; right side score improved over ten years and then declined.

laboratory_examinations.date: Initial X-ray in 1976; follow-up X-rays in 1984, 1993, 2002, 2005
laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial X-ray showed advanced arthritis of left hip and mild arthritis of right hip. Follow-ups revealed wear of both acetabular components and deformed femurs but no loosening or migration of components.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression of arthritis noted over the years; wear of acetabular components observed at last follow-up.
